outline:
NLM1.01 slob dpon chen po pad+ma ka ra'i thugs rje'i nying khu mdos cho ga sna tshogs blto sgro sa mas bsgyur chen chen dga' ba'i ltas mo zhes bya ba
NLM111NLM1_0011
1b1-70a3 1
NLM2.01 dpal gsang dbang 'dus pa'i dbang gi cho ga'i tik+ka dbang dbang don de nyid rab gsal yang dag gsal sgron me mkhas pa'i mgul rgyan zhes bya ba
NLM221NLM2_0011
1b1-83b2 1 ces pa 'di ni dpon slob rin po che 'jam dbyangs grags pa dpal bzang po'i gsungs dri ma med pa yin no
NLM3.01 'phags pa thugs rje chen po zhal bcu gcig pa dpal mo'i lugs kyi sgrub thabs smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa phan bde'i snang ba ga sar dngom zhes bya ba
NLM331NLM3_0011
1b1-51a5 1
NLM3.02 bsangs kyi cho ga dngos grub kyi gzi 'od 'bar ba ngo mtshar rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba
NLM331NLM3_0012
1b1-27a2 104 ces bsangs kyi cho ga dngos grub kyi gzi 'od 'bar ba ngo mtshar rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs rus cho 'brang sogs yon tan du ma'i dpal gyis mngon par mtho zhing khyad par rgyal ba gnyis pa'i bstan pa bstan 'dzin la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa rnam par dpyod pa'i mig yangs g.yo bas shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag la gzigs pa gsal ba sogs dam pas bsngags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lcang ra nas sde ba rin po che don grub pa rab rab brtan sku mched kyi bkas bskul ba la brten nas sde snod 'dzin pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis dpal 'khor bde chen du sbyar ba 'dis kyang phyogs dus thams cad du dge bar gyur cig mang+ga lam b+ha wantu
NLM3.03 lha mchog rnams la dga' bar byed pa'i bsangs mchod bcu gsum mu tig phreng ba
NLM331NLM3_0013
1b1-22b6 158
NLM3.04 slob dpon chen po pad+ma k'a ra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i 'bum bsangs bee durya'i sngon po bkra shis 'dod pa'i re skong ma zhes bya ba
NLM331NLM3_0014
1b1-18a3 203 zhes pa 'di ni lha mchog rnams la bsangs mchod bcu gsum 'bul bar dgos zhes don gnyer can mang pos bskul ba'i ched du sngon gyi mkhas pa'i dpe rnying la gtugs te aa ring las byung ba'i mdo stod kyi jo ni dgon po'i sh'akya'i dge slong grags pa bshad sgrub kyis sa phyogs yul khams thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i phyir du dge ldan chos 'khor gling du sbyar ba'o bkra shis pa dang dge ba 'phel gyur cig
NLM3.05
NLM331NLM3_0015
1b1-4a2 237 zhes lugs gnyis kyi rgyud 'debs 'di yang bsnyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga'i zur du skul mnyam 'ga' la nye bar mkho 'am snyam pa'i lhag bsam bzang pos sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni dbu mdzad dge slong bstan pa bkra shis so ngag gi dbang phyug blo bzang grags pa dang dbyer med 'jam dpal rdo rjes bzung ba bshad sgrub bstan 'dzin bshes gnyen dam pa la gsol ba 'debs so bdag brgyud byin gyis rlobs
NLM4.01 byang chub lam gyi rim pa brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor thun mong min pa nyams su cho ga skal ldan mgul rgyan nor bu'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba
NLM441NLM4_0011
1b1-85a4 1 ces byang chub lam gyi rim pa la brten pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor thun mong min pa nyams su cho ga skal ldan mgul rgyan nor bu'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs rus dpal gyis mngon par mtho ba'i chang gis rgyal po'i gdung brgyud bla ma dkon mchog 'a mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing lugs gnyis la mkhyen pa'i spyan yangs pa gung ho lo che dar han hong tha'i ci 'phags pa skyabs kyis gtsos pa'i dza sag bcu bzhi'i bla gra dpon g.yog stong phrag du ma la slob dpon aa bhya ya ka ra dang grub chen mi tra'i lugs kyis rdo rje 'phreng ba'i dbang dang byang chub lam rim dmar khrid bde lam dang lam gtso rnam gsum bla ma mchod pa sogs kyi lung 'khrid 'bul bar byed pa'i dus su gud nyid kyi gr'a tshang gi dang slob dpon pa pi lig thu dge slong ngag dbang dge 'dun yer te ni pi she ril thu bla ma blo bzang rdo rje dge bskos das cheng pi leg thu thon dge slong blo bzang dge legs yer te ni dbu mdzad dge slong blo bzang sangs rgyas dge bskos das ching dar han nod so au rgyan ngag dbang aer te ni pi lig thu thon chos rgya mtsho sogs dang gzhan yang dge bshes dar han bla ma dge slong tshe brten rdo rje aa chi thu dar han bla ma dge slong blo bzang rab 'phel aer hem pi lig thu slob dpon dge slong tshul khrims tA bla ma dge slong blo bzang doh grub phi lig thu t'a bla ma dge slong bzang spyod nig tha pi lig thu bla ma dge slong shes rab shes dar dge bskos blo bzang rdo rje pi lig thu dar han nang so dge slong 'jigs med dge slong skon mchog bkra shis dge slong bkra shis blo bzang tshe brtan sogs dar tshogs pa'i grwa rigs mang po'i thugs 'dod bzhin la rang gi bsod nams gsog pa'i rgyur 'gyur pa'i rkyen kyis kyang nye bar bskul bas mtshams sbyar te yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag lcang skya rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang blo bzang chos ldan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa'i byang chub lam gyi rim pa'i dmigs rim mdor bsdus 'khyer bde'i ltan nas bdag la dam pa de nyid kyi mkhas grub kun gyi gtsug rgyan rgyal ma gnyis pa'i ring lugs la chen po bka' drin mnyam med drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang ye shes bstan pa'i sgron me dpal bzang pos khrid gnang ba'i dus kyi snyan rgyud man ngag zhal shes la gzhi byas gzhan nas kyang kha skod dgos pa rnams kyis brgyan te yongs 'dzin dam pa chos bzhin spyod pa spyi dang khyad par thog mtha' bar gsum du bka' drin 'gran zla dang bral ba'i rigs dang dkyil 'khor kun gyi khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang blo bzang nor bu shes rab dpal bzang po yab sras kyi bka' drin 'tsho ba dang yang skos byang phyogs bstan pa'i bdag po rje btsun blo bzang dam pa blo bzang thub bstan dbang phyugs 'jigs med rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i bka' 'bangs th'a shal dge slong grags pa rgya rgyas sam ming gzhan aer te ni jo bo bla ma khri ba nom chi chos rjer 'bod pas shing 'brug lo'i hor zla drug pa'i tshes bcu gsum la dge sa tshan bcu ldan bur ge 'i ma char dga' ldan dar rgyas gling du sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rnam dbyod dang ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog bkra shis dang bsod nams dbang phyugs gis bgyus so 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dus kun tu 'phel bar gyur cig
NLM4.02 thub dbang gnas brtan 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'i sgo nas yul khyad par can la brtan bzhugs 'bul tshul thub bstan rgyas pa'i nyen byed zhes bya ba
NLM441NLM4_0012
1b1-5b3 170 ces thub dbang gnas brtan bcu drug 'khor bcas la mchod cing mtshan 'dzin gsol ba gdab pa'i sgo nas yul khyad par can la brtan bzhugs 'bul tshul thub bstan rgyas pa'i nyen byed zhes pa 'di ni ^ser smad mkhan po blo bzang thugs rjes mdzad pa'i gnas bcu bstan rgyas ma ma'i sgo nas brnyan bzugs 'bul tshul dang phyag mchod thub bstan rgyas byed sogs chog sgrigs te lag len nag 'gros su 'khod pa zhig dgos zhes rang gi slob ma 'ga' zhig nas zhes sun yang yang btang ba'i ngor dge sbyongs dzny'a na'i ming can gyi nyang brang chu bzang ri khrod du bsgrigs pa'o sarba mang+ga lam bkra shis par gyur cig dge'o
NLM4.03 tshe lha rnam gsum gyi mngon rtogs
NLM441NLM4_0013
1b1-3b6 181 zhes pa 'di ni tshe lha rnam gsum tshar sgrub par 'dod kyang so sor mi lcogs pa rnams la 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir 'di 'dra zhig dgos zhes dang brtson ldan pa dge slong dkon mchog zla ba'i bskul ngor btsun pa dkon mchog bstan pa'i sgron me bris pa'o
NLM4.04 gung thang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung ba'i tshe lha rnam gsung gyi sgo nas gzhan don sgrub pa'i bum pa sgrub tshul gsal byed pa'i lhan thabs tshe yi mchog stsol ces bya ba
NLM441NLM4_0013
3b6-7b2 186
NLM4.05 dge ldan bka' brgyud rin po che'i phyag chen rtsa ba rgyal ba'i gzhung lam zhes bya ba
NLM441NLM4_0014
1b1-4b5 195 ces phyag rgya chen po'i ngo sprod byed tshul 'di yang 'di nang gis chos brgyad smyon ba'i zlos dkar ltar mthong nas dben pa'i ri sul du drang srong gi spyod tshul gyis 'dug nas lam 'di la nyams len snyong por byed pa gnas bcu rab 'byams pa dge 'dun rgyal mtshan dang ha mthong bka' bcu pa shis rab seng ge gnyis kyis snga mo nas yang yang bskul zhing gzhan yang nges don phyag chen gyi nyams len phyed par 'dod pa'i rang gi slob ma mang pos bskul ba dang khyad par rje grub pa'i dbang phyug thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal ba dben sa pa chen po de nyid kyis rang gzhan la 'doms par mdzad pa'i nyams mgur zhig te bshes gnyen bsten tshul nas zhi ltag gi bar bka' gdams lam rim ltar nas gdams nas mjug tu bshad ma thag pa'i lam 'dis yin pa da lta'i gans can pa la mi grags pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gdams ngag mthar thug pa da lta yi ger 'god par mi nus so zhes de dus dgag bya'i dbang gis mi 'god bgyi dus dgongs pa dber na dam chos pad dkar du sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu rtogs bya'i phyir thabs 'di rang 'byung gis ni mdzad gyur gyi de dag rnams la khyed cag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes ni nam yang mi sung ngo ci phyir zhe na skyob pa dus la gzigs zhes gsungs pa dang 'dra ba'i bzhed ba bsgub pa'i phyi ma ston pa mnyam med sh'akya'i rgyal po nas bzung ste bdag gi rtsa ba'i bla ma thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi na la sngags nas kyi bar lam 'di mngon sum du thugs nyams su bsnyar ba'i byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa mnyams shing dam tshig la sel ma zhugs pa'i rigs su byung zhing mdo rgyud dam pa'i man ngag 'dzin pa'i sbong pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis dge ldan rnam rgyal ba'i gling du sbyar ba'o
NLM4.06 oM swa sti drag po sbyin sreg gyi 'don pa'i go rim
NLM441NLM4_0015
1b1-2b3 203
NLM5.01 dpal rta mchog rol pa gsang sgrub kyi gtor bzlog bgegs dpung mthar byed zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_0011
1b1-30a7 1
NLM5.02 khro bo rgyal po rta mchog rol pa gsang sgrub kyi gtor bzlog gi lag len gsal byed rig pa 'dzin pa'i dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_0012
1b1-11a6 61 ces khro rgyal rta mchog rol pa gsang sgrub kyi gtor bzlog gi lag len bsal byed rig pa 'dzin pa'i dgongs brgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni zab zhab sogs yi ge'i rigs kha cig gzo ba la rig rtsal shin tu myur zhing legs pa la lugs zung gi bslab bya'i don la gnas shing dad dang rnam dpyod zung du 'brel ba'i snying gi bu slob me tre sa ga ras dus ring mo nas lan gcig min par nan tun du bskul ba bzhin 'di dang phyogs mthun gyi man ngag 'ga' zhig la rten te 'bri ba'i tshe lha mi'i mdun sa chen po co nye'i rgyal khab nas brgyud lung man gi gnad rnams mgrin par smra ba'i mchog dam pa au pa si ka sa 'phral du sgrub dgos tshul byung zhing gzhan yang don gnyer can la legs tshul rim bzhin byung bar brten nas bzlog chog mchan dang bcas pa'i dgos gzhir bzung ba 'di'i gter gzhung shangs pa'i yig rnying dang rgyal dbang mchog gis mdzad pa'i 'khor lo'i kha byang du mdzad pa po pad+ma rdo rje'i man ngag tshad thub rnams la zhib mor dpyod de manga lam a'a yu sthi ras lcags phag chu stod zla ba'i dmar phyogs kyi dga' ba gnyis par rdzogs par sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni bskul ba po rang nyid kyis bgyis pa 'dis kyang dgra bgegs kyi g.yul las rgyal bar gyur cig sarba mang+ga lam bkra shis
NLM5.03 khro bo rme brtsegs la brten nas grib glud rdzongs chog 'khyer bde ba zhig
NLM551NLM5_0013
1b1-6a2 87 zhes pa 'di ni bka' chen kun dga' blo gros kyi gsung bzhin bris pa yin pas khungs thub par yod cing mkhyen rab chos rje'i snag dpon bsod nams lhun grub kyis mdzad pa'i yig cha yang yod par snang ngo zhes pa'ang ^dam tshig rdo rjes so dge legs 'phel
NLM5.04 rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi sgo nas tshe 'gugs byed tshul 'khyer bde
NLM551NLM5_0014
1b1-7a3 99 zhes pa 'di ni bla ma'i gsungs las btus te ^dam tshig rdo rjes bris pa'o
NLM5.05 'byung bzhi gtor ma'i gdams pa nyams su len tshul gsal bar bkod pa nam mkha'i rnga chen zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_0015
1b1-28b3 113 ces 'byung bzhi gtor ma'i gdams pa nyams su len tshul gsal bar bshad pa nam mkha'i rnga chen zhes bya ba 'di ni ^'jam dbyangs gong ma'i bka' lung gis ching su tsug thu no mong hang du 'bod pa'i ban chung gyin ba su ma ti aabhya sh'a sa na syad+h+wa dza zhes bya bas ^snang ba mtha' aas pan chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos rgyan dpal dpal bzang po'i gsung chog bsgrigs gzhir bzhag seng chen sprul pa'i spru rin po che dang bzhad dngul chu bla ma chos bzang pa'i bshad khrid kyi yig cha dang gtor chog gi yi ge gzhan dag las kyang ci rigs par btus te 'khyer bde bklag chog gi tshul du nye bar sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni sdom brtson gam drung dge slong blo ldan gyis bgyis pa'o par yig bris pa po ni blo bzang tshe sgrub pa'o dge'o
NLM5.06 rgyal po'i gsol mchod dregs pa'i re ba skong byed zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_0016
1b1-10a6 169 ces pa 'di ni blo gros kyi 'jug pa mchog tu yangs pa'i dge slong dkon mchog tshul khrims kyis grong chog pa rnams kyi thugs bzhed bskong ba'i slad du bris dgos su bskul bar rten snyig dus kyi mtha' la sleb pas rgyal po'i gnod pa bdo ba'i dus 'dir 'ga' zhig la phan pa'ang srid dam snyam pas rgyal po'i mdos gzhung sogs khungs thub rnams kyi don dang mi 'gal bar bsgrigs pa po ni dharma swa mi wa gindra pa tu siddhi ming can no 'dis kyang 'gro ba rnams nga rgyal dang zhe sdang gis bskul ba'i gnod byed kyi 'char sgo sna tshogs las thar bar gyur cig
NLM5.07 btsan gyi gsol mchod 'phrul gyi mchod sbyin zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_0017
1b1-9b3 189 ces btsan gsol 'phrul gyi mchod sbyin zhes bya ba 'di ni khu re chen mo'i tar han aem che'i khams tshan gyi dge 'dun rnams kyi sku'i rim gror 'di lta bu zhig dgos zhes khams tshan rang gi bla ma dge slong ye shes bstan 'dzin dang rab 'byams pa blo bzang rdo rjes bskul ba ltar btsun pa wa gindra pa tu siddhis bris pa 'gro ba rnams nga rgyal gyi 'char sgo las thar bar gyur cig
NLM5.08 yi dam mkha' 'go chos srung spyi la sbyar rung gi bzlog pa'i cho ga mi mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_0018
1b1-9a3 207 ces yi dam chos bsrung spyi la sbyar rung gi bzlog pa'i cho ga mi mthun phyogs las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam dpyod yangs pa'i dge slong blo bzang dpal ldan dang dad ldan dge slong mkhas mchog sogs don gnyer can 'ga' zhig gis yang yang bskul ba'i ngor btsun gzugs ratna'i ming can gyis ^rje 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa dang grub dbang tho'u bkwan rin po che skyabs rje ngag dbang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan sogs kyi gsung las btus te bsgrigs pa'i yi ge pa ni dge slong patu p+hadras bris pa dza yan+tu
NLM5.09 ltung bshags kyi sgo nas 'chi bslu bya tshul
NLM551NLM5_0019
1b1-6a4 225 zhes sogs bka' stsal ba 'di nyid thugs la bzhag nas rin chen lta bu'i rten mchog yun ring du gnas pa'i thabs de dag la 'bad par 'tshal dge'o
NLM5.10 rlung rta'i lha la bsangs mchod 'bul tshul
NLM551NLM5_00110
1b1-4a5 237
NLM5.11 bse rag 'byung po'i gnod pa zhi bar byed pa'i thabs zab mo
NLM551NLM5_00111
1b1-10a1 245 zhes pa 'di ni ngag dbang pas bris pa'o
NLM5.12 glud gtor gto bcos ci rigs kyi thog mthar sbyor rgyu'i yan lag 'ga' zhig
NLM551NLM5_00112
1b1-9b1 265 'di yang 'phral du nyer mkho stabs bde chen wagindras khungs @009b ldan gyi yig cha rnams las btus te spel pa'o
NLM5.13 sa bdag chab gtor gtong tshul rkyen ngan kun sel zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_00113
1b1-7a3 286 zhes sa bdag chab gtor tu grags pa 'di'i ngag 'don phal cher yig rnying ltar la cung zad bcos pa 'di chos mdzad bla ming 'chang bas bsgrigs pa'i dge bas 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig
NLM5.14 lan chags gtor ma gtong tshul yungs 'bru'i lhun po zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_00114
1b1-16a2 299 de'ang rje bla mas nyams len gang la'ang go bas legs par phyed pa dang ma phyed pa gnyis pa phan yon che chung gi khyad par shin tu che bar yang yang gsungs pa bzhin nye char lan chags gtor ma gtong tshul cung zad dmigs phyed par byas pa'i yungs 'bru lhun po zhes bya ba 'di yang bu lon dkor gyi phun po btsun gzugs ^ngag dbang pas rang nyid kyi kyi lan chags bsrab pa'i cha rkyen rgyun 'khyer du gsung rab du ma las btus te sug las su bgyis pa'o
NLM5.15 grub chen lce sgom pa'i 'chi blu'i gtor ma
NLM551NLM5_00115
1b1-4b2 331 zhes pa 'di btsun gzugs sh'a sa na d'i bam zhes bya bas sbyar ba'o 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig bkra shis par gyur cig
NLM5.16 dpal ldan lha mo'i mdos glud
NLM551NLM5_00116
1b1-5b1 339 cho ga 'di ni ^brag ri yongs 'dzin rdo rje 'chang gi gsung thor gyi gras lags so
NLM5.17 lo ma gyon ma rigs gsum gyi bsgom bzlas rgyun 'khyer ma
NLM551NLM5_00117
1b1-3a2 349 lo ma gyon ma rigs gsum gyi bsgom bzlas rgyun 'khyer mdor bsdus 'di btsun gzugs dam tshig rdo rjes bris dge bas 'gro kun bde thob shog aa roksha
NLM5.18 ba ri lugs khro bo rme brtsegs dud kha'i bsgom bzlas 'khyer bde zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_00118
1b1-2b3 355 zhes pa'ang rang gzhan gyi don du rje btsun sa pan sogs gyi yig cha dang mthun par dam tshig rdo rjes bris pa'o
NLM5.19 me mchod kyi cho ga 'khyer bde bkra shis dpal 'bar zhes bya ba
NLM551NLM5_00119
1b1-5b4 359 ces me mchod bya tshul mdor bsdus bkra shis dpal 'bar zhes bya ba 'di ni rang gi slob ma dpyod ldan dbu mdzad dge slong rdo rje'i ming can nas phyogs 'dir me mchod kyi srol kun tu dar yang mchod thabs yid brtan rung ba zhig mi snang bas khungs ldan 'khyer bde'i chog zhig cis kyang dgos zhes nan tan tu bskul ba ltar tshad thub kyi dam pa gong ma'i man ngag gi phyag srol dang sgo bstun te ^dam tshig rdo rjes g.yang khral tsam du bris pa 'dis kyang skye 'gro mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig dge legs 'phel
NLM5.20 kha 'bar ma dkar mo'i sgo nas 'chi blu bya tshul
NLM551NLM5_00120
1b1-4b3 369 zhes kha 'bar ma dkar mo'i sgo nas 'chi blu bya thabs dang bar chad bzlog thabs 'di nyid au rgyan rin po ches mdzad nas lho brag gnam skas can du klu bdud nag po'i lto bar sbas phyis gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug gis bton nas gdan drangs pa'i gter gzhung ltar rig 'dzin ngag gi dbang po'i sdes kong long mtshams kyi ding thang zhes pa ae wam lcang sgar du chog bsgrigs su mdzad pa'o bka' drin gsum ldan gyi bla ma khyab bdag bde ba'i rdo rjes chog bsgrigs mdzad pa yin pas yid ches par mdzod cig 'di'i lung ni khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang nas zhus pa'o
NLM5.21 rje btsun seng ge sgra la brten pa'i klu dang sa bdag gi gdon 'grol gyi cho ga nyer bsdus nad gdon kun sel phan bde'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 1b1-26a6 NLM551NLM5_00121
377 ces rje btsun seng ge sgra la brten pa'i klu dang sa bdag gi gdon grol gyi cho ga nyer bsdus nad gdon kun sel phan bde'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba 'di ni nad pa sogs kyi don du 'phral du sgrub dgos pa'i skabs du mar cho ga zor yang ba 'di lta bu zhig mkho che bar mthong nas rgyal khams pa ^dam tshig rdo rjes ^rje btsun gong ma'i gsung la kha skangs cung zad sbyar te bklag chog tu bkod pa'i yi ge pa ni dpyod ldan dge slong dge 'dun dar rgyas so 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan thogs par gyur cig bkra shis
NLM5.22 rlung rta bskyed pa'i mdos chog 'dod don lhun grub ces bya ba
NLM551NLM5_00122
1b1-11b5 431 zhes pa 'di yang slob dpon pad+ma ka ra'i has po ri yi logs kyi dur khrod brag khung nag por gter tu sbas pa'i man ngag zab mo mdos chog sna tshogs ltos sgro sa ma ya bsgyur chen dga' ba'i ltan mo las khol du phyung ste dgongs don dang mi 'gal bar mkhyer bde bklag mchog gi tshul du ^no mon han ming pas bkod pa 'dis kyang bstan 'gro la phan thogs par gyur cig
NLM5.23 rgyal gsol mdor sdus dregs pa mnyes byed ces bya ba
NLM551NLM5_00123
